title: jack-o'_valentine
body:
A playable character in the [i][[Guilty Gear]][/i] series.

h4. Appearance

* [[Ankh]] [[pendant]] attached to a [[black lanyard|black]] [[lanyard]]
* [[Ball and chain restraint]] [[ball and chain (weapon)|used]] as a [[weapon]] ([[Dorpos]])
* Bangs [[hair between eyes|between eyes]]
* [[Spiked halo|Compass rose]] [[halo]]
* [[Large breasts]] or [[medium breasts]] with no cleavage
* [[Mature female]]
* [[Pumpkin mask]] ([[grey mask|grey]] [[mask]]) with a [[forehead mark|forehead]] [[ankh]] and [[glowing eyes|glowing]] [[green eyes]]
** Frequently [[unworn mask|removed]] and [[holding mask|held]] 
* [[Shiny clothes|Shiny]] [[white bodysuit|white cloth]] [[bodysuit]] with a [[skin tight]] torso, [[ankh]]s, and [[ankh print]]
** [[White pants|White]] [[front slit]] [[bell-bottoms]]
** [[Collared shirt|Collared]] [[white shirt]] with [[front slit]] [[long sleeves]]
*** Has a [[plunging neckline]] as if an unzipped bikesuit, but with no zipper
* [[Tareme]]
* [[Too many belts]] ([[too many|ten]]), each [[belt buckle|buckled]]
** Four [[open belt]]s on each sleeve
** Four belts on the mask
** Waist [[skull belt]], held up with a [[shoulder belt]]
* [[Two-tone gloves|Two-tone]] [[black gloves|black]] and [[red gloves|red]]  [[fingernails|fingernail]] [[gloves]] with [[ankh print]]
* [[Two-tone shoes|Two-tone]] [[black shoes|black]] and [[red shoes|red]] [[high heels|high heel]] [[shoes]]
* [[Very long hair|Very long]], [[messy hair|messy]], [[two-tone hair|two-tone]] [[red hair|red]] and [[white hair]] with [[blunt ends]] and [[colored inner hair]]

In [i][[Guilty Gear Xrd|Guilty Gear Xrd Revelator]][/i], Jack-O' has [[red eyes]] and predominantly white hair, with red on the underside.
In [i][[Guilty Gear Strive|]][/i], Jack-O' has a [[broken halo]], [[green eyes]], and predominantly red hair, with white on the underside. The red part of her ankh pendant became green following her release as a playable character.

h4. See also

* [[Jack-O' Challenge]]
other_names: ジャック・オー=ヴァレンタイン

title: colored_shoe_soles
body:
Outsoles that do not match the body and are colored, white on non-[[sneakers]], or black on white footwear.

This tag does not implicate [[shoe soles]] since the bottom side surface may not be significantly visible, particularly [[high heels]] which are most likely able to apply this tag from non-below angles compared to other footwear.

[b]Avoid[/b] this tag when:

* feet lie flat and the toes are facing directly toward or away from the viewer resulting in a tiny amount of visible soles.
* the footwear is viewed [[from above]] in standing position.
* the footwear is [[uwabaki]], or similar, which are white-and-colored by default and the color covers the toe box, unless focused on [[shoe soles]].

h4. See also

* [[Christian Louboutin (brand)]]
* [[colored shoe interior]]
* [[two-tone shoes]] (consider this if the body also contains the color)
* [[shoe soles]]

She wears a [[open jacket|open]] [[yellow jacket|yellow]] and [[white jacket|white]] [[striped jacket|striped]] [[letterman jacket]], a [[white vest]] with [[buttons]], a [[short dress|short]] [[brown dress]], a [[name tag]], [[loose socks|loose]] [[white socks]], and [[yellow shoes|yellow]] [[multicolored shoes|and]] [[red shoes|red]] [[sneakers]].

body:
The default costume of [[Nijisanji EN]]'s [[Mysta Rias]]. 

His default attire is composed of a [[collared shirt|collared]] [[striped shirt|vertical-striped]] [[orange shirt|orange]] shirt (with [[black shirt|black]] and [[white shirt|white]] stripes, and an [[open collar]] exposing his [[pectoral cleavage]]), [[long sleeves|long-sleeved]] [[white coat]], [[white pants]], [[black belt]], [[black shoes|black]] [[multicolored shoes|and]] [[white shoes|white]] [[loafers]], [[black collar]], a [[single sock|single]] [[grey socks|grey sock]] on top of his left leg plus a [[leg belt]], [[black gloves|black]] [[half gloves]], a black [[wristband]] on his right wrist, and [[hoop earrings]]. He sometimes wears a [[black headband]] and a [[fox hat|fox]] [[animal ear headwear|hat]].

title: scarle_yonaguni_(1st_costume)
body:
The default costume of [[Nijisanji EN]]'s [[Scarle Yonaguni]].

Her default ILUNA [[school uniform]] costume comprises a [[collared shirt|collared]] [[white shirt|white]] [[dress shirt]] underneath a [[white jacket|white]] [[cropped jacket]] and [[shirt tucked in|tucked]] under a [[black corset]]. The corset also has a [[checkered skirt|checkered]] [[red skirt]] which is also worn over another [[white skirt]]. She wears a pair of [[see-through clothes|see-through]] [[black pantyhose]] and a pair of [[red shoes|red]] [[multicolored shoes|and]] [[black shoes|black]] [[loafers]] on her bottom half. 

Scarle's accessories are composed of a pair of [[earrings]], a [[gold necklace]] with a triangle-shaped [[jewelry]] attached to it, a [[gold choker]], several [[bracelet|bracelets]] on her left wrist, a [[red nails|red]] [[nail polish]] on her nails (except the ring nails that are [[white nails|polished white]] instead,) a [[scepter]] that rest on a [[white belt]] over her waist, and another [[black belt]] worn over her corset. From the reference sheet, Scarle also wears a [[black bustier]] underneath her shirt, has the top buttons of her shirt [[partially unbuttoned|unbuttoned]] to expose her [[large breasts|breasts]] and [[cleavage]] and have few moles on her body, two [[mole under eye|under her right eye]] and one on her [[mole on breast|left breast]].

h4. Appearance

* !post #5522267: Reference sheet
* !post #6906251: Merchandise

body:
The 2nd [[official alternate costume|costume]] of [[OWOZU]]'s [[Rakkun Sutaru]], designed by [[sasakura (npdk7484)|Sasakura]] & [[Kana616]]. Mostly known as her "2nd season" or Owozu's model.

In contrast to her [[rakkun sutaru (1st costume)|classic indie]] appearance, she has [[multicolored eyes|multicolored]] [[red eyes|red]] and [[blue eyes|blue]] eyes, now often depicted with red [[colored inner hair]] and her tail is more brown.

This costume consists of a [s][[beige jacket|beige]][/s] and [[brown jacket]], worn over a [[white camisole]], a black underbust and [[black shorts|black]] [[high-waist shorts|high-waist]] [[short shorts]]. She also wears a [[brown hat|brown]] raccoon-shaped hat, [[brown thighhighs]], [[black gloves]] and [[multicolored shoes|multicolored]] [[black shoes|black]] and [[green shoes|green]] [[platform shoes]].

title: scottie_(pokemon)
body:
[b]Scottie[/b], known as [b]Kei[/b] (ケイ) in Japan, is the male player character in [i][[pokemon|Pokémon]] [[pokemon masters ex|Masters EX]][/i].

A new Trainer on a new adventure with Pokémon, ready to take his important first steps toward becoming a Pokémon master [tn](official bio)[/tn].

He has [[grey eyes]] and [[short hair|short]] [[black hair]]. He wears a [[green hat|green]] [[baseball cap|cap]], a [[white shirt|white]] [[short sleeves|short-sleeve]] [[t-shirt]] under a [[high collar]] [[sleeveless jacket]] with a [[zipper pull tab|zip tab]], [[black pants|black]] [[capri pants]], [[green shoes]], and carries a [[backpack]] and [[poryphone]].

title: wattson_(pokemon)
body:
[b]Wattson[/b] (Japanese: [b]テッセン[/b] Tessen) is the Electric-type Gym Leader of Mauville City, located in the Hoenn region of the [[Pokemon]] franchise. He first appeared in [i][[pokemon rse|Pokémon Ruby and Pokémon Sapphire]][/i] and his signature Pokémon is [[Manectric]].

* In [[Pokemon RSE]], Wattson wears a [[brown sweater]] over his [[yellow jumpsuit]] and [[black shoes]].

title: misty_(pokemon)
body:
[b]Misty[/b], known as [b]Kasumi[/b] (カスミ) in Japan, is a character introduced in [[pokemon|Pokémon]] [[pokemon rgby|Red and Green]].

The Cerulean City gym leader, known as the Tomboyish Mermaid, she specializes in Water-types. Her signature Pokémon are [[Starmie]] and [[Articuno]].

Her look varies across different media. In her most iconic outfit from the [[pokemon (classic anime)|anime]], she has [[short hair|short]] [[spiked hair|spiky]] [[orange hair]] tied in a [[side ponytail]] and wears a [[yellow tank top|yellow]] [[crop top|cropped]] [[tank top]] and [[short shorts]] with [[suspenders]].
In the games, she usually wears swimwear, such as a [[blue bikini|blue]] [[sports bikini]] in [[pokemon frlg|FRLG]] and a [[white one-piece swimsuit]] with a [[white jacket]] in [[pokemon hgss|HGSS]].
In her [[pokemon lgpe|LGPE]] outfit, she wears an [[orange bandeau|orange]] [[bandeau]], a [[blue shirt|blue]] [[two-tone shirt|and]] [[white shirt]], [[grey shorts|grey]] [[denim shorts]], and [[red shoes|red]], [[blue shoes|blue]] [[multicolored shoes|and]] [[white shoes|white]] [[sneakers]].
Her eye color varies from [[aqua eyes|aqua]] to [[green eyes|green]] or [[blue eyes|blue]].

h4. Official Art

Her main outfit consists of a [[torn scarf|torn]] [[yellow scarf]], a [[sleeveless shirt|sleeveless]] [[white shirt]] with a [[button gap]] for her [[cleavage]] and [[midriff|mid]][[navel|riff]], a [[red jacket|red]] and [[purple jacket|purple]] [[plaid jacket|plaid]] [[two-sided jacket]] [[jacket partially removed|partially removed]] with its [[zipper]]s closed, and a [[single pauldron]]. She also wears a [[red skirt|red]] [[suspender skirt|suspender]] [[pencil skirt]] with a [[loose belt|loose]] [[brown belt]] and a wider [[black belt]], a [[single thighhigh|single]] [[white thighhighs|white thighhigh]] with a [[thigh strap]], and [[black boots|black]] [[fur-trimmed boots]].

title: taiyo_pepper
body:
Character in the series [[PriPara]]. 

Pepper has [[dark-skinned female|dark skin]], [[yellow eyes]] and [[short hair|short]] [[curly hair|curly]] [[brown hair|brown]]/[[grey hair]] with [[short hair with long locks|long locks]]. She usually wears [[Paprika Private Academy school uniform]], personalized with a [[tiger print]] [[print neckerchief|neckerchief]]. 

When in her [[idol clothes|PriPara form]], Pepper usually wears a [[frilled bow|frilled]] [[hair bow]], a green [[crop top]] with a [[fur collar]], [[shoulder cutout]], [[puffy short sleeves]] and a [[red gemstone]] in the middle, [[fur cuffs]], a [[miniskirt|short]] [[layered skirt|layered]] [[green skirt]], a [[lion tail]], [[black thighhighs]] with green stripes and [[green boots|green]] [[high heel boots]] with a [[fur-trimmed boots|fur trim]].

title: azusa_mifuyu
body:
A character in [[Magia Record: Mahou Shoujo Madoka Magica Gaiden]]. She is acquaintances with [[Nanami Yachiyo]].

She has [[aqua eyes]] and [[short hair|short]] [[grey hair]] with [[swept bangs]] and [[hair horns]].

In her daily life, she wears a [[black rose|black]] [[hair flower|rose in her hair]], a [[black choker|black]] [[choker]] with an [[orange gemstone]] [[pendant choker|pendant]], a [[necklace]], a [[red shirt|red]]/[[brown shirt|brown]] [[off-shoulder shirt|off-shoulder]] [[shirt]] with [[puffy long sleeves|puffy]] [[long sleeves]] that exposes the [[bra strap]]s, a [[red belt|red]]/[[brown belt|brown]] [[belt]] that features the [[infinity symbol]] symbol, [[black shorts|black]] [[shorts]], [[black thighhighs|black]] [[thighhighs]], and [[grey footwear|grey]] [[flats]].
When she was younger, she used to wear the [[Mizuna Girls' Academy school uniform]] paired with [[purple thighhighs]].

As a [[Magical Girl]], she wears [[grey ribbon|grey]] [[hair ribbon|ribbons in her hair]], a [[black choker|black]] [[choker]] with an [[aqua gemstone]], a [[grey jacket|grey]] [[sleeveless jacket|sleeveless]] [[jacket]] with a [[hooded jacket|ho]][[hood down|od]], [[fur-trimmed jacket|fur trim]], [[coattails]] and [[pom pom (clothes)|]]s, a [[short dress|short]] [[grey dress|grey]] [[dress]] with [[frilled dress|frills]] and [[cross-laced clothes|cross-lacing]], [[black gloves|black]] [[gloves]], [[long sleeves|long]] [[grey sleeves|grey]] [[fur-trimmed sleeves|fur-trimmed]] [[detached sleeves]], [[grey thighhighs|grey]] [[thighhighs]] and [[grey boots|grey]] [[fur-trimmed boots]]. She fights using a [[chakram]].

She is voiced by [[Nakahara Mai]].

title: school_of_performing_arts_seoul_school_uniform
body: School of Performing Arts Seoul (SOPA; Korean: 서울공연예술고등학교 / 서공예) is an arts high school located in Gung-dong, Guro District, in Seoul, South Korea. This school is well known for its high number of K-pop idol alumni. While it's not exclusively an idol school, many trainees and established idols attend or graduate from SOPA to pursue their performing arts education. The uniform of it is unique for the yellow blazer.

title: pokemoa
body:
A versatile Japanese artist, the webmaster of "pokesho", a [[Pokemon]] fansite.

title: mule_love
body:
Mule Love is a short child-like Ranker with large blue eyes. He is always seen sporting a baseball cap with a long jacket and blue bottoms; his cap and jacket share the same blue chequered design and his overall attire has a blue-coloured theme. Love is drawn more cartoon-like than other characters.

Love appears to be a very proud and defiant person and will even go as far as to bend the rules to suit his own whims. However, despite his occasional outbursts that match his young appearance, he is generally mature enough to understand situations and accept his mistakes.

title: magical_witch_academy
body:
An eroge by Atelier Kaguya with illustrations by [[M&M (mickey and mackey)|]].

Japanese name: マジカルウィッチアカデミー 〜ボクと先生のマジカルレッスン〜

h4. Game Synopsis

In a fantasy world, magic exists and is pretty common.

[[tsukasa strobilanthus|Tsukasa]] is a young, shy boy with a beautiful and delicate face. He also suffers from a strange curse: he can make any girl who looks in his eyes feel sexually excited and jump on him.

In order to find a way to get rid of this curse, he uses a pair of magic glasses to block its effects while he studies magic at the witch academy.

The problem is, his class is filled with beautiful girls and hot female teachers who can't get their hands off him...

h4. Characters

title: snk
body:
[b]SNK[/b], an acronym of [b]Shin Nihon Kikaku[/b] (新日本企画, lit. "New [[Japan]] Project"), is a legendary [[video game]] company, most notable for its powerful [[Neo Geo]] console from the 90s as well as various fighting games (like [[Fatal Fury]] and [[The King of Fighters]]), and [[arcade]] shooters like [[Metal Slug]]. Its main rival is [[Capcom]].

SNK's predecessor [b]Shin Nihon Kikaku Corporation[/b] was founded in 1978 by Kawasaki Eikichi. In 1981, the name was informally shortened to SNK Corporation, which became the company's official name in 1986.

SNK merged with Playmore in 2003 after going bankrupt in 2001 to form [b]SNK Playmore[/b]. The company eventually changed its name back to [b]SNK[/b] in 2016.

She has mercenary experience and her weapon of choice is a [[gun]].

title: kilt
body:
The kilt is a knee-length garment with pleats at the rear, originating in the traditional dress of men and boys in the Scottish Highlands of the 16th century. Since the 19th century it has become associated with the wider culture of [[Scotland]] in general, or with Celtic (and more specifically Gaelic) heritage even more broadly. It is most often made of woolen cloth in a [[plaid|tartan pattern]].

h4. See also

* [[Fustanella]]

title: downward_dog
body:
A body posture associated with [[yoga]] in which a person is [[bent over]] in a [[top-down bottom-up]] position with their feet slightly [[legs_apart|apart]], hands on the floor with their [[arms up]] at shoulder width and neck straight with the head facing toward the legs.

The name is said to come from the way dogs stretch after raising up.

h4. Examples

* !asset #26942284

h4. See also

* [[bent over]]
* [[looking through own legs]]
* [[top-down bottom-up]]
* [[jack-o' challenge]]

title: dark_souls_i
body:
[b]Dark Souls[/b] is the first game of the [[dark souls (series)|Dark Souls trilogy]]. Dark Souls is the spiritual successor to [[Demon's Souls]] and the second installment in the [[dark souls (series)|series]]. 

The game was released in 2011 for [[Playstation 3]] and [[Xbox 360]]. In 2012, [i]Dark Souls: Prepare To Die Edition[/i] was released for PC, which was later ported to consoles.

title: splatoon_(series)
body:
[b]Splatoon[/b] (スプラトゥーン [i]Supuratuun[/i]) is [[Nintendo]]'s 3rd-person multiplayer shooter video game that stars [[squid]] humanoids called [[inkling player character|Inklings]] that wield various weapons such as [[super soaker]]s, [[paint roller]]s, [[paintbrush|paint brushes]] and so on.

The game starts by the player creating and customizing her/his own Inkling and being able to play either single player or multiplayer modes.

In [[Splatoon 2]] and [[Splatoon 3]], the player can choose to play as the [[octopus]] humanoids, [[Octoling player character|Octolings]].

h4. Series

* [[Splatoon 1]] ([[Wii U]])
* [[Splatoon 2]] ([[Nintendo Switch]])
** [[Salmon Run (Splatoon)|]]
** [[Splatoon 2: Octo Expansion]]
* [[Splatoon 3]] ([[Nintendo Switch]])
** Salmon Run Next Wave
** [[Splatoon 3: Side Order]]
* [[Splatoon (manga)]]
* [[Splatoon Raiders]]

h4. Species

* [[Inkling]]
* [[Octoling]]
* [[Octarian_(enemy)|]]s
* [[Salmonid]]s
* [[Super Sea Snail]]
* [[Jelleton]]s
* [[Jellyfish (Splatoon)|]]
* [[Zapfish]]

h4. See Also

* [[List of weapons in Splatoon]]
* [[Inkling (language)]]
* [[Woomy]]

title: star_savior
body:
Upcoming game by developer Studiobside, known for their 2D tower defense gacha game [[Counter:side]].

It follows the story of the Captain, a mysterious boy from another world, being transported to a place called Nebula City by an organization called the Nebula Observation Agency (NOA), as he is beckoned to teach, lead, and guide the many Saviors in their Journey to inherit the legacy of the legendary hero revered by many as the titular Star Savior.

h4. External Links

* "Official Twitter/X (EN)":[https://x.com/starsavior_en]

body:
An [[official alternate costume|official costume]] of [[Azur Lane]]'s [[Belfast (azur lane)|]].

Her attire consists of a [[red hat|red]] [[beret]] on her head; there is a [[black bow]] which, depending on the artist, is either a [[hair bow|hair]] or [[hat bow]]. She also wears a [[black choker]] and an [[off-shoulder sweater]], along with a [[black skirt|black]] [[pencil skirt]]. She wears [[brown pantyhose]] and [[black footwear|black]] [[high heels]]. She sometimes wears a red [[shawl]] around her arms.

h4. Appearance

* !post #3688541: Profile
other_names: メイド長とお買い物(アズールレーン)

title: nurse
body:
When a character is wearing the attire of a nurse. A nurse is a health care professional who regularly assists [[doctor|doctors]] and other health care professionals in the [[syringe|treatment]], safety, and recovery of [[sick|ill]] and [[injury|injured people]]. Nursing is largely a female profession, but men can be nurses as well.

While most modern nurses wear [[medical scrubs]] at their workplaces, the attire this tag most often applies to is the [[white dress]] and [[nurse cap]] combination that was popular during the 20th century. Before then, western nurses were known for wearing a combination of a nurse cap, [[black dress]], and a [[white apron]].

h6. Clothing
* !post #3596801:  [[white dress]] [tn]| Most common type of [[dress]].[/tn]
* !post #139259:  [[nurse cap]]

title: suomi_kp/-31
body:
The Suomi KP/-31 ([i]Suomi Konepistooli 31[/i], or "Finland machine pistol 31") was a [[submachine gun]] used by Finland in [[World War II]], and exported in small numbers to several other nations.

It was designed by Aimo Lahti from 1921 to 1931, produced from 1931 to 1953, and remained in service until 1998. The weapon is most commonly pictured with a [[drum magazine]], which held 71 rounds of 9x19mm ammunition, but numerous other magazines were also used: a 20-round box, a highly unsuccessful 40-round drum, a 50-round quadruple-stack "Coffin" box, and post-WW2, a highly reliable Swedish 36-round box. The 71-round drum magazine inspired the very similar magazine of the Soviet [[PPSh-41]].

h4. See also

* [[Suomi (Girls' Frontline)]]
* [[submachine gun]]
* [[PPSh-41]]
* [[List of weapons]]

h4. External links

* "Wikipedia: Suomi KP/-31":http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Suomi_KP/-31

title: mosin-nagant
body:
A [[Russia]]n 7.62×54mmR [[bolt action]] [[rifle]].

It entered service in 1892 with the Russian [[military]] and was primarily used in the [[Russo-Japanese War]], [[World War I]], and [[World War II]]. The Mosin-Nagant features a straight/horizontal bolt handle (except on the [[sniper rifle|sniper]] variant, which had a bent bolt handle), slot-type [[gun sling]] mounts (except for the [[finland|Finnish]] variants), and a partially visible 5-round internal [[magazine (weapon)|magazine]] in front of the trigger.

h4. See also

* [[Mosin-Nagant (Girls' Frontline)]]
* [[Obrez]]
* [[List of weapons]]

h4. External links

* "Wikipedia: Mosin-Nagant":http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mosin%E2%80%93Nagant

title: h&k_p30
body:
The [b]P30[/b] is a polymer-framed [b][[handgun]][/b] manufactured by [[Heckler & Koch]], available in 9×19mm and .40 S&W.
The [[gun]] can be recognized by its small rounded hammer, dovetail rear sight, angular trigger guard, finger grooves, railed dust cover and large diagonal serrations. 

It is the [[weapon]] of choice of [[Kayoko (blue archive)|]] from [[Blue Archive]] as well as [[John Wick (character)|]] (P30L variant with a [[compensator]]).

h1. See also
* [[H&K VP9]]
* [[List of weapons]]
* [[P30 (Girls' Frontline)]]

h1. External links

* "Wikipedia: Heckler & Koch P30":https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heckler_%26_Koch_P30

title: fim-92_stinger
body:
A US-developed man-portable surface-to-air [[rocket launcher|missile system]] (MANPADS). Normally shoulder-fired by a single operator, it can be adapted for use against [[helicopter]]s and [[military vehicle|ground vehicle]]s. It entered service in 1981 and is used by the [[military|militaries]] of the [[United States]] and 29 other countries. Principally manufactured by "Raytheon Missiles & Defense":[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Raytheon_Missiles_%26_Defense].

The use of supplied Stingers by Mujahideen gunners during the [[war in afghanistan|Soviet-Afghan War]] was responsible for most Soviet aircraft losses.

h4. See also
* [[FGM-148 Javelin]]
* [[List of Weapons]]
* [[St. Javelin]]
h4. External links
* "Directory of US Rockets and Missiles: FIM-92":http://www.designation-systems.net/dusrm/m-92.html
* "Wikipedia: FIM-92 Stinger":[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/FIM-92_Stinger]

She is in a master-disciple relationship with [[ladis_(iris_mysteria!)]], where Naja is the magic mentor.

title: laura_matsuda
body:
[[Street Fighter V]] character. Jujitsu practitioner from Brazil. Older sister of [[Sean Matsuda]].

She has light tan skin, [[brown eyes]], a [[black hair|black]] [[asymmetrical hair]] style consisting of [[long hair]] on one side, [[cornrows]] on the other. Her default attire consists of a green [[front-tie top]], green [[capri pants]], [[toeless legwear|toeless]] [[ankle wrap]]s and several multicolored [[bracelet|bracelets]].

Her "story mode" attire consists of a [[green shirt|green]] [[crop top|cropped]] [[cropped shirt|shirt]] short enough to expose [[underboob]], [[micro shorts]], [[highleg panties]], and [[gladiator sandals]]. 

The word printed in her shirt "Bonita" could be translated to english as pretty or beautiful.

title: swing
body:
Typically depicted as a [[hanging]] seat fastened to [[rope|ropes]] or [[chain|chains]]. If hanging from a purpose-built framework, it may be part of a [[swing set]]. Unconventional types of swings may lack a defined seat and can be made from other materials such as [[vines]] in a [[flower swing]].

h4. Types of swing
* !post #5482184: [[basket swing]]
* !post #2077316: [[flower swing]] (made of [[vines]])
* !post #5567423: [[patio swing]]
* !post #5675970: [[swing set]] (regular swing on a swing set featuring assistance via [[pushing]])
* !post #6873658: [[tire swing]] 
* !post #4100937: [[toddler swing]]
* !post #9131433: [[trapeze]]

h4. See also

* [[flower swing]]
* [[patio swing]]
* [[tire swing]]
* [[playground]]

title: baju_kurung
body:
The [b]baju kurung[/b] is a traditional Malay outfit commonly worn by women in Malaysia, Brunei, Indonesia (especially in Sumatra), and Singapore. It consists of:

* A [b]long-sleeved, loose-fitting blouse[/b] that extends to the knees or below, often with a high neckline.
* A matching [b]long skirt[/b] (called [i]kain[/i] or [i]sarong[/i]), typically pleated or with a wraparound design.

The design prioritizes modesty and comfort, making it a popular choice for school uniforms, formal occasions, and religious events. While traditionally made from cotton or silk, modern versions come in various fabrics and colors, often decorated with embroidery or patterns.

title: shichi-go-san
body:
Shichi-Go-San (七五三, lit. 'seven-five-three') is a traditional Japanese rite of passage and festival day for three and seven-year-old girls, and five-year-old and sometimes three-year-old boys. It is held annually on November 15 and celebrates the growth and well-being of young children.

h4. See also

* [[Tag Group:Holidays and celebrations]]

h4. External links

* "Wikipedia: Shichi-Go-San":[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shichi-Go-San]

body:

If the ahoge is simply floating on top of the character's head, see [[detached ahoge]].

Not to be confused with [[no ahoge]] - a type of [[tag group:artistic license|artistic license]] where the artist decides not to draw a character's pre-existing ahoge.

title: tsunderia
body:
American [[Virtual YouTuber]] group. Due to the flexible nature of its members, only tag posts if the member in question was part of Tsunderia when the art was made, and do not retroactively add or remove said tag.

On January 25, 2023, Tsunderia was dissolved as a company. Its remaining talents retained their models to continue activity as [[indie Virtual YouTuber]]s.

title: taiga_toragami
body:
A [[Virtual YouTuber|VTuber]] afflited with the agency [[ChromaSHIFT]] under their 4th branch "EternalS".

As her name implies, she is a [[tiger girl]] with [[tiger ears]] and a [[tiger tail|tail]].
For her default costumes, she wears a a [[white jacket]] worn over a [[black dress|black]] [[China dress]] with [[sleeves past wrists|sleeves that go past her wrist]] she also has [[red footwear|red]] [[sandals]].
For her default hairstyle, she has [[long hair|long]] [[white hair]] with [[blonde hair|yellow]] [[streaked hair|streaks]].

title: lalabell_lullaby
body:
A Spanish-speaking [[Virtual YouTuber]] part of the 1st generation of [[ChromaSHIFT]]'s ES branch called "EternalS". She was designed by [[Muryotaro]].

She's a [[Magical girl|maho shoujo]] [[rabbit girl]], wearing a [[white dress|white]] [[layered dress]], white [[puffy short sleeves]], a [[purple bowtie]] with a [[rabbit brooch|rabbit-shaped brooch]], and [[mini wings]]. She also wears [[white gloves]] and [[mary janes]]. Her legwear is [[asymmetrical legwear|asymmetrical]] with a [[frilled thigh strap]], [[ankle garter]], [[leg ribbon]], [[red footwear|red shoe]]  on one side, and [[bandaid on leg|multiple]] [[bandaid on knee|bandaids]], a [[loose socks|loose sock]] and a [[pink footwear|pink shoe]] on the other.

She has [[pink eyes]]. For her default hairstyle, she has [[very long hair|very long]] [[split-color hair|split-color]] [[pink hair|pink]] and [[white hair|white]] hair with some [[streaked hair|streaks]], [[hair rings]] a [[star ahoge]], [[braid|braids]] and [[hair ribbon|ribbons]]
